boardgame.name: Manoeuvre
拿破崙時代
boardgame.description: Manoeuvre is a fast-playing game of battlefield command, set in the early 19th century. Multiple geomorphic game maps provide the chessboard-sized battlefields over which eight different armies of the period (France, Britain, Russia, Spain, Austria, Turkey, Prussia, and the US) clash. Each country has 8 units and a deck of cards specific to the country. move and fight in one-on-one battles. As the commanding General of a nation's army, you have at your command units and a 60-card national deck which represents your army's specific troops and unique strengths. Your job is to utilize those assets and manoeuvre your forces to achieve battlefield supremacy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

2008 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee
2009 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee

Well, cannot say it is new in shrinkwrap. I have pulled the shrinkwrap, punched and trim the counters and put them into zip lock back. But beside that everything is in unplayed, see all the cards is still in shrinkwrap unopened, like new and mint condition. See pictures for the condition. GMT may take a bit longer to reprint this game, but if you want to get an almost like new copy right now and pay a little bit extra, this is for you. You can still have this for Christmas... Well, world wide shipping maybe too late now, but local US shipping can still make Christmas this year... Buyer pays actually shipping, plus a couple of dimes and nickles to cover gas. contact me for any questions.

Manoeuvre COMPONENTS: * One full-color countersheet * 12 geomorphic cardboard map sections * 8 nationality card decks (60 per deck) [France, Britain, Russia, Spain, Austria, Ottoman, Prussian, and United States] * 2 Player Aid Cards * Rules * 4 6-sided dice, 4 8-sided dice, 4 10-sided dice ONLINE RESOURCES * Final Rulebook (2/7/08) * VASSAL Module - Courtesy of Mark Beninger * Thoeursday Night Fight Club, a website/blog dedicated to online play of Manoeuvre via VASSAL. REVIEWS # _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Manoeuvre: Hard to Spell, Great to Play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, by James Smith (Boardgame Geek) # _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Three Reasons Why You Should Manoeuvre in on This Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, by B?a?ej Kubacki (Boardgame Geek) PUBLISHED: 2008 DESIGNER: Jeff Horger SYSTEM DESIGN: Joe Roush MAP _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; CARD ART: Knut Grnitz COUNTER ART: Mark Simonitch and Rodger B. MacGowan ART DIRECTOR: Rodger B. MacGowan PRODUCERS: Gene Billingsley, Tony Curtis, Andy Lewis, Rodger MacGowan, M Shipping will be USPS Priority Mail. International orders will be the cost of shipping plus insurance.

Each country has 8 units and a deck of cards specific to the country. move and fight in one-on-one battles. Your job is to utilize those assets and manoeuvre your forces to achieve battlefield supremacy. . See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

This is the edition with the better quality map boards. I will ship world wide but the buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. I will accept paypal, check, and money order.
